_comment: MatrixOS System Configuration Template - Copied to settings/config/ on first run

display._comment_driver: Driver selection: 'auto' = auto-detect best for platform, 'terminal' = ANSI terminal, 'macos_window' = Pygame window (macOS), 'hdmi' = HDMI output (Pi), 'led_matrix' = LED matrix HAT (Pi)
display._comment_override: Set driver_override to force specific driver: 'terminal', 'macos_window', etc. Leave null for auto-detection
display._comment_scale: Pixel scale factor for window drivers (4 = 256x192 becomes 1024x768 window)
